thread.title: Beyoncé Breaks Instagram Record & Releases More Maternity Photos
thread.title_full: Beyoncé Breaks Instagram Record & Releases More Maternity Photos

author: Danielle Harling
title: Beyoncé Breaks Instagram Record & Releases More Maternity Photos

organizations.name: beyoncé breaks instagram record & releases more maternity photos

text:
A photo posted by Beyoncé (@beyonce) on Feb 1, 2017 at 10:39am PST 16 
Beyoncé nearly broke the internet when she announced her pregnancy via an artsy photo uploaded to Instagram yesterday (February 1). 
While it’s impossible to gauge exactly how many buckets of tears the haters cried, it has now been revealed that Bey’s photo was the most-liked Instagram image ever. 
In the 21-or-so hours since it was posted, the image has been double-tapped 8.23 million times. That’s enough to give it almost 2 million more likes than the image that previously held the record, a shot of actress-turned-popstar Selena Gomez drinking from a straw, which was uploaded last year. A photo posted by Selena Gomez (@selenagomez) on Jun 25, 2016 at 2:03pm PDT 
Despite being bumped by Bey’s baby bump, Gomez still has Instagram’s most followers (aside from the photo-sharing site’s own account), with 108 million to Beyoncé’s 93.1 million. 
In addition to breaking Instagram records, Beyoncé also made serious noise over on Twitter. According to Twitter’s stat-tracking division, the singer’s pregnancy announcement received half a million tweets in 45 minutes. Half a million Tweets about @Beyonce 's surprise #twins announcement. It's been 45 minutes. (Spiked at 17k Tweets per min.) 🍼🍼 
— Twitter Data (@TwitterData) February 1, 2017 
But that wasn’t enough for Bey and the twins to break any Twitter records. 
To give you some context, Donald Trump’s presidential inauguration generated about 58,000 tweets per minute at its peak. Beyoncé’s announcement spiked at 17,000 tweets per minute. 12 million Tweets have been sent so far today related to the #Inauguration . Peaked at 58k Tweets sent per minute at 12:02pm EST. pic.twitter.com/bmqg1jdU8w 
— Twitter Data (@TwitterData) January 20, 2017 
Beyoncé followed up the record-breaking post by sharing many more maternity photos on her website . Check some of them below. Beyoncé's underwater maternity photos 💙 🌊 pic.twitter.com/spExBrHxtA 
— BEYONCÉ LEGION (@Bey_Legion) February 2, 2017 Beyoncé's underwater maternity photos 💙 🌊 pic.twitter.com/4HfVdNqNIG 
— BEYONCÉ LEGION (@Bey_Legion) February 2, 2017 Beyoncé & Blue (and the twins) 💙💙💙 pic.twitter.com/klBfjgB34L 
— BEYONCÉ LEGION (@Bey_Legion) February 2, 2017 Beyoncé's maternity shoot 💙💙💙 pic.twitter.com/8RMrz0HD3V 
— BEYONCÉ LEGION (@Bey_Legion) February 2, 2017 Subscribe to DX Newsletter Get The Most Important Stories Of The Day Straight To Your Inbox Thank You! Thank You! Thank You!
